Source code for pyssian.dynamicparse

"""
Provides specializations of GaussianOutFile to simplify dynamic parsing of
files. This module is still in development.
"""
import time
from threading import Thread
from .gaussianclasses import GaussianOutFile


[docs]class Updater(object):
    def __init__(self,GOF):
        self.GOF = GOF
        self.Finisher = []
        self.Thread = Thread(target=BackgroundUpdater,args=(self.GOF,self.Finisher))
        self.Thread.start()

[docs]    def stop(self):
        self.Finisher.append("Stop")


[docs]    def isAlive(self):
        return self.Thread.isAlive()


[docs]    def update(self):
        self.GOF.update()


[docs]class RealTimeGOF(object):
    """Wrapper for easier console control of a Gaussian output """
    def __init__(self,File,Links):
        self.File = open(File,"r")
        self.GOF = GaussianOutFile(self.File,Links)
        self.Updater = Updater(self.GOF)
    def __repr__(self):
        cls = type(self).__name__
        return "< Watcher ({}) of File {} >".format(cls,self.File.name)
    def __len__(self):
        return len(self.GOF)
    def __getitem__(self,index):
        return self.GOF[index]

[docs]    def stop(self):
        self.Updater.stop()


[docs]    def close(self):
        self.File.close()


[docs]    def end(self):
        self.stop()
        self.close()


[docs]    def isAlive(self):
        return self.Updater.isAlive()


[docs]    def update(self):
        self.GOF.update()



[docs]class ConvergenceWatcher(RealTimeGOF):
    def __init__(self,File):
        cls = type(self)
        super(cls,self).__init__(File,[103,502])


[docs]class OptFreqWatcher(RealTimeGOF):
    def __init__(self,File):
        cls = type(self)
        super(cls,self).__init__(File,[1,103,502,716,9999])



[docs]def BackgroundUpdater(GOF,Finisher):
    while len(GOF)<2 and not Finisher:
        GOF.update()
        time.sleep(10)
    else:
        print("Updater on {} has Finished\n".format(GOF.__repr__()))
